question: Deepak Kumar, who has won 10<sup>th</sup> Olympic quota for India, belongs to which sport?
explanation: Deepak Kumar clinched India’s tenth Olympic quota in shooting for Tokyo 2020, with a bronze medal in men’s air rifle in the Asian championship. Deepak qualified in the third place with a score of 626.8 behind the Chinese who had already won the quota. Manu Bhaker claimed the women’s 10 metres air pistol gold medal in the 14th Asian Championship in Doha. Deepak is the second Indian shooter to earn an Olympic quota in the men’s 10 metres air rifle event after Divyansh Singh Panwar, who secured it in April.
